00020 // For each live variable records whether this variable has not been assigned, has one value or multiple values.
00021 // There is one nodeConstAnalysisDebugLevel object for every variable
00022 class nodeConstLattice : public FiniteLattice
00023 {
00024         private:
00025         // the unique ID of the value of the variable (if known)
00026         unsigned long valID;
00027                 
00028         public:
00029         // The different levels of this lattice
00030         // this object is uninitialized
00031         static const int uninitialized=0; 
00032         
00033         private:
00034         // no information is known about the value of the variable
00035         // (we haven't seen an assignment)
00036         static const int bottom=1; 
00037         // the value of the variable is known
00038         // (we've seen exactly one assignment)
00039         static const int valKnown=2; 
00040         // this variable may have more than one value at the given CFGNode
00041         static const int top=3; 
00042         
00043         public:
00044         // public names for the different levels that correspond to the final outcome of the analysis
00045         static const int noAssign=bottom;
00046         static const int constVal=valKnown;
00047         static const int multVal=top;
00048         
00049         private:
00050         // this object's current level in the lattice: (uninitialized, bottom, valKnown, top)
00051         short level;
00052         
00053         public:
00054         
00055         nodeConstLattice()
00056         {
00057                 valID=0;
00058                 level=uninitialized;
00059         }
00060         
00061         nodeConstLattice(const nodeConstLattice& that)
00062         {
00063                 this->valID = that.valID;
00064                 this->level = that.level;
00065         }
00066         
00067         // initializes this Lattice to its default state, if it is not already initialized
00068         void initialize()
00069         {
00070                 if(level == uninitialized)
00071                 {
00072                         valID=0;
00073                         level=bottom;
00074                 }
00075         }
00076         
00077         // returns a copy of this lattice
00078         Lattice* copy() const;
00079         
00080         // overwrites the state of this Lattice with that of that Lattice
00081         void copy(Lattice* that);
00082         
00083         // computes the meet of this and that and saves the result in this
00084         // returns true if this causes this to change and false otherwise
00085         bool meetUpdate(Lattice* that);
00086         
00087         // Computes the maximum of this node and that, which is just like meet
00088         // except that different values get max-ed, rather than push the result to top
00089         // returns true if this causes this to change and false otherwise
00090         bool maxUpdate(nodeConstLattice& that);
00091         
00092         // If this lattice is at level valKnown, increments the value by the given amount
00093         // returns true if this causes this to change and false otherwise
00094         bool increment(int val=1);
00095         
00096         // computes the meet of this and that and returns the result
00097         //Lattice* meet(Lattice* that) const;
00098         
00099         bool operator==(Lattice* that);
00100         
00101         /*private:
00102         // returns this object's level
00103         short getLevel() const;
00104         
00105         public:*/
00106         // returns whether the variable is constant at the current node
00107         short getValConst() const;
00108         
00109         // Sets the state of this lattice to bottom
00110         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00111         bool setToBottom();
00112         
00113         // Sets the state of this lattice to the given value.
00114         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00115         bool set(unsigned long valID);
00116         
00117         // Sets the state of this lattice to top
00118         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00119         bool setToTop();
00120                 
00121         std::string str(std::string indent="");
00122 };
